name: file_xor
description: Quart + Uvicorn web server and Telegram bot for streaming files.

FILEDB_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID used as the file DB (e.g. -100123...)

PORT.description: Port the web server listens on

SUDO.description: Telegram user id(s) allowed to use sudo commands (comma or space separated)

BOT_LOGO.description: URL to the bot logo image (displayed in app listings or web UI)

BOT_NAME.description: Friendly name for the bot (used in web UI)

DOMAIN_URL.description: Public domain or base URL where the web server is reachable (e.g. https://example.com). If deploying to Heroku, defaults to https://${HEROKU_APP_NAME}.herokuapp.com when HEROKU_APP_NAME is set.

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'Set BOT_TOKEN, API_ID and API_HASH in Heroku config vars before starting the bot.'
